install.description:
Payment Plug-in for RBS Global Gateway using XML Redirect.
In order to configure and use this plug-in you must have a RBS Global Gateway account.
Global Gateway is sometimes referred to as "BiBit".

The Hosted Payment Page (XML Redirect) service guide:
  • http://www.rbsworldpay.com/support/kb/gg/submittingtransactionsredirect/rxml.html
  • http://www.worldpay.com/support/kb/gg/payment-pages-pilot/Redirectamends.pdf
